meetups.heroSubtitle: Join a Global Circle of Spiritual Seekers
meetups.heroDesc: Weekly online satsangs to pause, reflect, and grow ‚Äî together starting April 2026.
meetups.whatIsSatsangDesc1: The word satsang comes from two Sanskrit roots: sat, meaning truth, purity, or the real, and sanga/sangha, meaning company, association, or community. Put together, satsang means associating with people and teachings that reflect spiritual reality rather than ignorance.
meetups.whatIsSatsangDesc2: Traditionally, a satsang is an audience with an enlightened teacher who provides spiritual instruction. However, in modern contexts, satsang can mean any gathering of people for the purpose of discussing, practicing, or contemplating spirituality.
meetups.guruVideoDesc: Each Sunday, we gather online to watch a short video from a spiritual master ‚Äî Ramana Maharshi, Sri Aurobindo, Anandamayi Ma, and others.
meetups.groupReflectionDesc: Then, you're placed into a private virtual circle of 6‚Äì8 people from around the world.
meetups.globalCommunityDesc: Together, you reflect on what touched you, what challenged you, and how to live these teachings more deeply.
meetups.innerClarityDesc: Discover calm and insight through the wisdom of great teachers.
meetups.humanConnectionDesc: Connect deeply with others on the same path.
meetups.soulfulConsistencyDesc: One gentle hour each week, dedicated to growth.

meetups.welcomeDesc: Thank you for joining our global spiritual community. You'll receive an email with meeting details and preparation guidance within 24 hours.

journeys.heroSubtitle: Embark on transformative spiritual adventures that connect you with ancient wisdom, sacred places, and your inner truth. Each journey is carefully curated to provide authentic experiences that foster deep personal growth.
journeys.whyNeedOneSubtitle: In our fast-paced world, sacred journeys offer profound opportunities for spiritual growth, inner healing, and connection with ancient wisdom traditions.

journeys.innerTransformationDesc: Experience profound shifts in consciousness through sacred practices, meditation, and connection with spiritual teachers and fellow seekers.
journeys.culturalImmersionDesc: Dive deep into authentic spiritual traditions, visiting sacred sites and learning from indigenous wisdom keepers in their natural environments.
journeys.culturalConnectionDesc: Immerse yourself in ancient spiritual traditions and connect with the living wisdom that has guided humanity for millennia.
journeys.soulCommunityDesc: Connect with like-minded spiritual seekers, forming lasting bonds and creating a supportive community for your ongoing spiritual journey.
journeys.communityGrowthDesc: Join a supportive community of fellow seekers who share your passion for spiritual discovery and personal transformation.
journeys.pricingFirstDesc: We believe spiritual growth shouldn't be limited by financial barriers. Our pricing is transparent from the start - no hidden fees, no surprise costs. We offer flexible payment plans and early-bird discounts to make these transformative experiences accessible to sincere seekers.
journeys.pricingItem1: All-inclusive pricing with no hidden costs
journeys.techFirstDesc: We seamlessly blend traditional spiritual practices with modern technology. From AI-powered journey matching to virtual preparation sessions, our tech-first approach ensures you're fully prepared and connected throughout your sacred journey.
journeys.partnershipFirstDesc: We partner directly with authentic spiritual teachers, local communities, and sacred sites. This ensures your journey benefits the local community while providing you with genuine, unfiltered spiritual experiences that commercial tours simply cannot offer.
journeys.partnershipItem3: Exclusive access to sacred sites and ceremonies
